"A.P.239/5/10/11:30": "That's... Anga Fundarge!"
"It's Profound Darkness catalyst. Wait, no... It's bait."
"What's it doing? Sending something to the ground?"
"...It's being absorbed, possibly replenishing. Right, Aurora?"
"Ouch! What are you thinking, Yucchan?!"
"You're way younger than me, so I'm going to keep teasing you."
"Te-Teasing!?"
"Twice. Those emotions during your story. Don't do it again."
"You came back here yourself. Think of the reason."
"When Photon forms a shape, either good or evil, there's meaning to it."
"Then Profound Darkness, after disconnecting from Dark Falz, what's the reason for your return?"
"Photons, at this time, in this place, why did they raise you? Why are you here?"
"The reason I'm here... The reason I'm here... My reason for being here..."
"It can't be help, that it had happened. Even if you still regret, nothing will change."
"So, to stop regretting. You have to work hard... Both of us."
"...Yucchan, why are you so strong?"
"I've always been alone. I'm sure my mind had collapsed, but..."
"There's a guy who trusted me, and that was enough."
"Yucchan, do you trust me? Do you believe me?"
"Third time."
"Weren't you the one who lead us into this place?! So stop worrying, Aurora."
"...Come on, why is it always you guys that give me encouragement... Shouldn't it be the opposite?"
"Under the influence of Profound Darkness's revival, the sealed power of Apprentice lies here. It's planning to revive it."
"To simply put it, it has attracted the bait. It's the same with that monster."
"Then, we can't just let it eat like that, right?"
"Yucchan, let's stop apprentice right here... I'll lend you my power."
"Lend me power?"
"Yucchan, say my name. My name that dances, shines, facinates more than anyone."
"The name that symbolizes me and my perceptions.Let my name be heard, call it."
"Enchanting Radiant Dance, Aurora."
"This weapon... Is this you?"
"Right now I'm embodied with the Photons. By taking a human form, I can become a weapon too. Yucchan's personal weapon..."
"I'm pretty wild with my weapons, y'know?"
"I don't care. It's painful, but we can worry about that later."
"Before it's exhausted and eaten by Apprentice, let's defeat it! What do you say?!"
"Roger!"
"Quest progress has been saved."
